column2: About Position:-  Position: Line Producer Experience: 3- 5 years      Qualification:    Post Graduates or Graduates (preferable MBA)          Degree/ Diploma in film,  art,  communications or related field.      Location: Trivandrum.
column11: Post production, Leadership skills, Production planning, Planning coordination, Project management, Management, Troubleshooting, Pre-production, Business Executive, Verbal

column2: ?     Line producers will be expected to carry out the following responsibilities:       Work with the producer, leads and supervisors to create, implement and run the show s schedule across all applicable departments         Oversee coordinators and PAs and ensure that dailies, rounds and meetings are well organised and that appropriate notes and follow-ups are actioned         Facilitate dailies; be present to support junior production staff & respond to supervision questions/requests         Making sure show requests are addressed timely         Take responsibility for knowing the details of the schedule and advising the coordinators accordingly     Job requirements    Essential Skills:       Prior experience of 7 years in Production in a VFX company         Knowledge of Shotgun       Desirable Skills:       Other Software skills (e.g. Maya, Nuke etc.)       ?
column11: Visual Effects, Project Management, Production, Maya, Vfx, Line Producer

column2: Job Description         To develop and execute a YouTube strategy for Nettv4u, with focus on existing channels, and channel growth.     Ensure production values and editing styles that will maintain the Nettv4u channel, but with special attention to what can possibly work on YouTube     Oversee the editorial calendars on each channel     Develop a YouTube approach to up - to - date news coverage for the Nettv4u channel     Develop the Explainers strategy and execution for the Nettv4u channel     Work with the newsroom to expand original reporting skills with specific focus on YouTube content     Identify new franchises, in collaboration with EP for Original Series, that works on YouTube     Develop skills on On - Camera     To identify newsroom talent for the development of Nettv4u channel on YouTube     To source new talents for our YouTube channels     Work closely with Social Publishing and Audience Development team to develop strategy for audience acquisition and growth.         Required Knowledge, Skills         2+ years experience in Journalism and/or Video Production     1 - 2 years leadership experience preferred
column11: Content strategy, Head Business Development, Publishing, Executive, Executive Editor, Journalism, Editor, Content development

column2: The Creative Producer is a primary point of contact for external writers as well as our in-house creative writers. You will work with the interactive fiction writing team by using your expertise and experience in guiding them in crafting characters, plots, and the progress of the stories for our mobile games. You will be writing story plots and dialogues too.       What will you need to do    (Role and Responsibilities)       Evaluate story ideas for potential as interactive stories.         Take a lead on ideas for posts on social media.         Help authors resolve issues with story structure, pacing, and quality, and ensure that the stories are consistent with our themes of Romance, Drama, Mystery, etc.          Generate ideas for stories, and write story plots and dialogues for them.          Create, implement, and manage internal processes related to the writers pipeline.         Create guidance documents for writers new to the project.         Take charge of the coin options within each story and ensure that they are appealing to the users.          Track the progress of writers and proactively address problems that arise.          Manage multiple projects simultaneously.         Editing, if required.         Extensively play our top competitors games (Chapters, Choices) and bring their learnings to the team and the game         Who could you beBackground, Experience Educational Qualification:         Graduate, with expert-level written and spoken English and impeccable grammar and sentence construction review skills.         Has exposure to what has worked in the US and Global markets, given that our target is the US, EU, and other markets. We DO NOT want to create content for India / Indian audiences.         Experience with leading, writing, and collaborating with a team of Writers.         Mastery of the structural basics of good storytelling.         Strong understanding of branching narrative.         Excellent written and verbal communication skills.         Strong organizational skills and ability to multi-task under strict deadlines.         Strong time and resource management skills.         On-the-fly problem-solving ability.         Ability to be creative on demand.         Someone who plays Mobile games.         Next Steps:         If this opportunity at excites you, please complete the following assignment:
column11: Story Ideas, Communication Skills, Social Media, Editing
